Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDeposits.label: Time Deposits
TimeDeposits.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit.

TradingGainsLosses.label: Trading Gain (Loss)
TradingGainsLosses.description: Amount of gain (loss) resulting from the difference between the acquisition price and the selling price or fair value of trading assets and trading liabilities, conducted separately from customer trading activities. Includes, but is not limited to, changes in fair value of trading assets and trading liabilities.

TradingSecurities.label: Debt Securities, Trading, and Equity Securities, FV-NI
TradingSecurities.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading) and investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

TradingSecuritiesDebt.label: Debt Securities, Trading
TradingSecuritiesDebt.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

TradingSecuritiesRealizedGainLoss.label: Trading Securities, Realized Gain (Loss)
TradingSecuritiesRealizedGainLoss.description: Amount of gain (loss) realized from securities classified as trading.

TransferToOtherRealEstate.label: Real Estate Owned, Transfer to Real Estate Owned
TransferToOtherRealEstate.description: Value transferred from mortgage loans to real estate owned (REO) in noncash transactions.

TravelAndEntertainmentExpense.label: Travel and Entertainment Expense
TravelAndEntertainmentExpense.description: Expenses incurred for travel and entertainment during the period.

TreasuryStockAcquiredAverageCostPerShare.label: Treasury Stock Acquired, Average Cost Per Share
TreasuryStockAcquiredAverageCostPerShare.description: Total cost of shares repurchased divided by the total number of shares repurchased.

UndistributedEarnings.label: Undistributed Earnings, Basic
UndistributedEarnings.description: The earnings that is allocated to common stock and participating securities to the extent that each security may share in earnings as if all of the earnings for the period had been distributed.

UndistributedEarningsDiluted.label: Undistributed Earnings, Diluted
UndistributedEarningsDiluted.description: The earnings that is allocated to common stock and participating securities to the extent that each security may share in earnings as if all of the earnings for the period had been distributed. Includes the adjustments resulting from the assumption that dilutive securities were converted, options or warrants were exercised, or that other shares were issued upon the satisfaction of certain conditions.

UndistributedEarningsLossAllocatedToPart.label: Undistributed Earnings (Loss) Allocated to Participating Securities, Basic
UndistributedEarningsLossAllocatedToPart.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) allocated to participating securities for the basic earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under the two-class method.

UnearnedPremiums.label: Unearned Premiums
UnearnedPremiums.description: Carrying amount of premiums written on insurance contracts that have not been earned as of the balance sheet date.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Reduction Resulting from Lapse of Applicable Statute of Limitations
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from lapses of applicable statutes of limitations.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

OciDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransfe.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Transfer to Held-to-Maturity, Adjustment from AOCI for Amortization of Gain (Loss), after Tax
OciDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransfe.description: Amount, after tax, of adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for amortization of gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) from transfer to investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

OciDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransfe.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Transfer to Held-to-Maturity, Adjustment from AOCI for Amortization of Gain (Loss), before Tax
OciDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransfe.description: Amount, before tax, of adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for amortization of gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) from transfer to investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

OciDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransfe.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Transfer to Held-to-Maturity, Adjustment from AOCI for Amortization of Gain (Loss), Tax
OciDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransfe.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) on adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for amortization of gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) from transfer to investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterest.label: Sensitivity Analysis of Fair Value, Transferor's Interests in Transferred Financial Assets, Impact of 10 Percent Adverse Change in Discount Rate
SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterest.description: The hypothetical financial impact of a 10 percent adverse change of the discount rate on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterest.label: Sensitivity Analysis of Fair Value, Transferor's Interests in Transferred Financial Assets, Impact of 10 Percent Adverse Change in Prepayment Speed
SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterest.description: The hypothetical financial impact of a 10 percent adverse change of prepayment speed on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterest.label: Sensitivity Analysis of Fair Value, Transferor's Interests in Transferred Financial Assets, Impact of 20 Percent Adverse Change in Discount Rate
SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterest.description: The hypothetical financial impact of a 20 percent adverse change of the discount rate on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterest.label: Sensitivity Analysis of Fair Value, Transferor's Interests in Transferred Financial Assets, Impact of 20 Percent Adverse Change in Prepayment Speed
SensitivityAnalysisOfFairValueOfInterest.description: The hypothetical financial impact of a 20 percent adverse change of prepayment speed on the fair value of transferor's interests in transferred financial assets (including any servicing assets or servicing liabilities) as of the balance sheet date.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable. Excludes allowance for financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable from recovery.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of writeoff of financing receivable, charged against allowance for credit loss.

StockRepurchaseProgramRemainingNumberOfS.label: Stock Repurchase Program, Remaining Number of Shares Authorized to be Repurchased
StockRepurchaseProgramRemainingNumberOfS.description: The remaining number of shares authorized to be repurchased by an entity's Board of Directors under a stock repurchase plan.
